name: 12in12_April_Typing_Experiment
description:
This project is a typing game where players need to hold down the left mouse button while typing out the words presented to them.  The player is instructed to pick up a 'grenade' using the left mouse button and if they let go then it explodes and the scene resets. With the goal being to reach the end of the scene holding the 'grenade' the whole time.

April's project was about making the players hyper-aware of their input. I wanted to make a project that forced the player to constantly be aware of their input and slipping up results in failure. I hoped to do this by forcing the player to constantly perform an action that inhibits their ability to complete the game.

The materials I used for this project are the 'Gridbox Prototype Materials' by Ciathyza.
